definition: dealing with red tape/paperwork/(Tw) word processing
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: This wordprocessor is special in that it enforces the use of styles.
sentences.chinese: 這個文書處理工具的特別之處是強制使用格式。

sentences.english: The treatment of documents is an inevitable important link in the management of colleges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 文書處理工作是高校管理中必不可少的重要環節。

sentences.english: Learn how to enter text in a wordprocessor.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何在文書處理工具中輸入文句。

definition: to run in parallel without hindrance/not mutually exclusive/two processes can be implemented without conflict
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
industrial relations/relations between labor and capital
